parameter.name: user
parameter.label: Username
parameter.description: Username for logging into the Cloudrain system

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: Password for logging into the Cloudrain system

parameter.name: clientId
parameter.label: Client ID
parameter.description: The Cloudrain Developer API Client ID

parameter.name: clientSecret
parameter.label: Client Secret
parameter.description: The Cloudrain Developer API Client Secret

parameter.name: connectionTimeout
parameter.label: Connection Timeout
parameter.description: The timeout in seconds for connections to the Cloudrain Developer API. Zero value means infinite timeout.

parameter.name: irrigationUpdateInterval
parameter.label: Irrigation Update Interval
parameter.description: The interval in seconds in which the status of irrigations is polled from the Cloudrain Developer API.

parameter.name: zoneUpdateInterval
parameter.label: Zone Update Interval
parameter.description: The interval in seconds in which existing zones are polled from the Cloudrain Developer API. This only updates the zone's properties such as the name and the thing status (online / offline). New zones can be discovered by running a scan job manually.

parameter.name: realtimeUpdates
parameter.label: Realtime Updates
parameter.description: Updates the remaining seconds of active irrigations in realtime without waiting for the polling interval. This update does not access the Cloudrain API. Offers more acurate status, but may increase overhead e.g. log entries.

parameter.name: updateAfterIrrigation
parameter.label: Update a zone's status after an active irrigation ended
parameter.description: Fetches an update from the Cloudrain API after projected end of an active irrigation without having to wait for the regular polling interval. Increases the amount of API calls, but offers more accuracy.

parameter.name: testMode
parameter.label: Testmode
parameter.description: The test mode does not require a Cloudrain account and provides a dummy implementation of the API in order to test the Binding.
